title: What happened to Twitch?

replies.body:
Nerfs/Soloqueue/Bad supports

I would only recommend Twitch if you are a smurf or high elo adc main...

The main reason being his early game and to an extent the beginning of his mid game.... People like Graves/Draven are always going to outduel him bot lane provided they stay even on cs, but once Twitch gets his Botrk/Yomu/I.e. things can turn around :)
Fairly sure before that if the rat gets in Graves face he is simply going to e > q > r, bye rat...  
Twitch with his low ad may also having issues getting really farmed due to crappy supps not helping him last hit under tower, etc.
